import React, { useState } from 'react' import Layout from '../../components/Layout/Layout' import {toast} from 'react-toastify' const Register = () => { const [name, setName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [phone, setPhone] = useState("") const [address, setAddress] = useState("") //form function const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(name,email,password,address,phone); toast.success(); }; return (

Register

setName(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="name" placeholder='Enter your name' required />
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="email" placeholder='Enter your email' required />
setPassword(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="password" placeholder='Enter your password' required />
setPhone(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="phone" placeholder='Enter your phone no' required />
setAddress(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="address" placeholder='Enter your address' required />
) } export default Register
